p: A comprehensive Pubmed, Web of Science, Embase, Medline and Cochrane library search was conducted based on the following keywords: ("testis"[MeSH Terms] OR "testis"[All Fields]) AND ("sars virus"[MeSH Terms] OR ("sars"[All Fields] AND "virus"[All Fields]) OR "sars virus"[All Fields] OR ("sars"[All Fields] AND "cov"[All Fields]) OR "sarscov"[All Fields]).
